item.title: CG & DI色彩管理 Color Management in CG&DI
item.description: * 本测试所有文件和工程可以从 Github @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI 下载 * All files and projects for this test can be downloaded from: Github @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI * 本测试使用OCIO (OpenColorIO )和ACES 1.2进行色彩管理 * This test uses OCIO (OpenColorIO ) and ACES 1.2 for color management * 本测试使用的色卡为 (ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr ), 其他色卡可以从 Github @colour-science: colour-nuke 下载 * The Macbeth ColorChecker used in this test is (ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr ), other ColorCheckers can be downloaded from Github @colour-science: colour-nuke <!DOCTYPE html> 色卡 Macbeth ColorChecker <!
